players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso, watch him. Any alibis?"
Charlie: "Investigating Diana as she's the only other villager. Watch Bob."
You: "Will prove my innocence, keep an eye on Diana."
Diana: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. Diana, you're the detective—stay vigilant."
Charlie: "Diana, investigate Bob. Alice's death is suspicious; look into it."
You: "Investigating Diana per Charlie's advice. Alice's death is suspicious."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
